TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EncryptedKeyEncryptingCredentials extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials

summary.span: 表示加密金鑰加密認證。

span.span: Represents the encrypted key encrypting credentials.

summary.span: 這些通常會用來做為資料加密認證，以加密權杖之類的東西。

span.span: These are usually used as data encrypting credentials to encrypt things like tokens.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: The certificate used to encrypt the key.

summary.span: 根據指定的 X.509 憑證初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果包裝認證是 X.509 憑證，而且您想要使用預設的演算法和加密演算法，分別為 RSA-OAEP 和 AES256 文繞圖，請使用這個建構函式。Use this constructor if the wrapping credential is an X.509 certificate and you want to use the default wrapping algorithm and encryption algorithm, which are RSA-OAEP and AES256 respectively.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您已經有使用這個建構函式物件，而且您想要使用它做為包裝的認證。Use this constructor if you already have an object and you want to use it as a wrapping credential.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果包裝認證是 X.509 憑證，而且您想要提供您自己的包裝的演算法和加密演算法，請使用這個建構函式。Use this constructor if the wrapping credential is an X.509 certificate and you want to supply your own wrapping algorithm and encryption algorithm.
